projects.name: iToBoS Annotation Tool
projects.summary: Developed a desktop application using React, Electron, and Vite for efficient management of YOLO-format annotations. Increased annotation efficiency by 40% and reduced error rates by 25%, supporting the EU-funded melanoma detection project.

projects.name: Stereo Visual Odometry
projects.summary: Created a real-time stereo visual odometry system for the KITTI dataset using feature detection, tracking, and 3D reconstruction. Achieved 96.5% accuracy in trajectory estimation with optimized C++ implementation.

projects.name: Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning
projects.summary: Designed a framework combining federated learning with differential privacy techniques, enabling collaborative model training while preserving data privacy. Implemented non-IID data handling and model compression, demonstrating only 2.8% accuracy loss compared to centralized learning.

projects.name: Skin Lesion Detection
projects.summary: Implemented and compared multiple deep learning architectures (CNNs, Vision Transformers) for melanoma detection, achieving 89.7% sensitivity and 85.3% specificity, exceeding published benchmarks by 7%. Developed custom data augmentation techniques to address class imbalance.

projects.name: Multi-Robot Swarm Control
projects.summary: Implemented Reynolds' flocking rules for coordinating robot swarms in ROS/Gazebo. Developed custom collision avoidance algorithms and collective decision-making behaviors that enabled effective navigation in cluttered environments with up to 20 robots.
